name: gethistoricalscoresbyyear
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool gaialens_historical_esg_scores.
Tool description: Data-driven and transparent historical ESG scores for over 17,000 companies
API description: This API returns historical Environmental, Social, Governance and Overall scores for companies on a scale of 0 to 100 based on the year provided in the request.  In addition to this, the API also provides other relevant metrics like Global Rank, Industry Rank and more.

year.description: The year for which to fetch the historical scores (must be less than or equal to 2020).

content_type.description: The type of content to return. Default is None.

sedol.description: The SEDOL identifier of the company. Default is None.

isin.description: The ISIN identifier of the company. Default is None.

companyname.description: The name of the company. Default is 'Apple Inc.'.
